entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Oak Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Oak Point Marine 02:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 77 %

Wind: SW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
